heroSection.title: Become a Multi-Engine Instructor
heroSection.subtitle: Take your aviation career to the next level with MEI certification
heroSection.additionalText: Our Multi-Engine Instructor Training Program launches in 2025. Reserve your spot today and join the future of aviation instruction!

introSection.title: Multi-Engine Instructor Training Program
introSection.description: Learn to teach multi-engine operations with confidence and skill. Our program is designed to prepare you for success as an instructor in twin-engine aircraft.

benefitsSection.title: Multi-Engine Instructor?
description: As a Multi-Engine Instructor, you'll be equipped to teach the next generation of pilots how to operate complex, twin-engine aircraft. Our MEI Training Program focuses on the skills you need to provide top-notch instruction and help students succeed in their aviation goals.

From handling emergencies to mastering advanced aerodynamics, you'll develop expertise in the unique challenges of multi-engine instruction. Our program ensures you'll be ready to meet FAA standards and confidently train aspiring pilots.

programDetails.title: Launching in 2025
programDetails.description: Our new Multi-Engine Instructor Training Program is designed for certified flight instructors looking to specialize in twin-engine operations. With limited spots available, secure your place today and be among the first to train in our advanced program.

locationSection.title: We are the flight training experts in Lanett, AL
locationSection.subtitle: Providing pilot training to the Auburn, Columbus, Opelika, LaGrange, Montgomery areas in Alabama and Georgia
locationSection.description: As the only independent flight school with a Cessna fleet in the area, we pride ourselves in training safe and highly proficient pilots. Come see what everyone's talking about! Visit Blue Skies Above and begin flight training today.
